Document.TEXT: Search for: Block Island Wind Farm The Block Island Wind cable project involved installing a 22-mile transmission cable from Rhode Island to Block Island, a 6-mile export cable from Block Island to the offshore wind towers, and four inter-array cables between the five turbines. Read More Block Island Wind Farm The Block Island Wind cable project involved installing a 22-mile transmission cable from Rhode Island to Block Island, a 6-mile export cable from Block Island to the offshore wind towers, and four inter-array cables between the five turbines. Fast-Track Project Wins the 2016 Build Ohio Award Kokosing Industrial was awarded the AGC of Ohio 2016 Build Ohio Award in the Industrial/Heavy Category.
